title: What Should I Do if the School Bully is Interested in Me - Novel Updates
tags: Character Growth   Cold Love Interests   Cute Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   First Love   Handsome Male Lead   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Popular Love Interests   Shy Characters   Strong Love Interests   Wealthy Characters
author: Shí xián   时闲
description:
Ji Liao was particularly distressed lately. He had been “sexually harassed” (confessed to) for no reason (out of nowhere). Moreover, the other party was a man! Never mind that it was a man but it was well-known *class grass.

– He Cheng Ming in front of others: “You wanna f*cking die?” “Better shut your mouth!” “Get lost! As far as you can!”

He Cheng Ming in front of Ji Liao: “Baby, you smell so nice~” “My dear, you’re so sexy!” “I’ll always listen to you. Kiss me okay?”

*class grass refers to the best-looking guy in the grade level>
